plot: Evelyn Brenner is a 94 year old artist who has lived in the same house in Brooklyn almost her entire life. The accumulation of her decades of spectacular art, at which she still works every day, has transformed the space into an awe inspiring phenomenon. Evelyn, herself, is articulate, charming and vital. The film is about the woman and the work.
title: Evelyn
